name: affirmation #1
affirmation: I am making a positive difference by using menstrual cups.

name: affirmation #2
affirmation: I am saving thousands of tonnes of waste by using sustainable products.

name: affirmation #3
affirmation: By reducing plastic waste, I am saving animals in the oceans, rivers, and beaches.

name: affirmation #4
affirmation: Menstrual cups are safe and will NOT get lost inside me.
